title: I got permabanned :(
body: About two weeks ago I got a 14-day ban. The ban was supposed to end today, so I checked my account. when I tried to log in I got so pissed, it said I got a permaban. So I basically got a permaban during a 14-day ban. I have no idea how I got this ban. I have also submitted a ticket about this but I hadn't got a reply yet. Can Riot remove this ban?

replies.body: It looks like you issued a chargeback on some of the payments on your account while you had that 14 day suspension. You can read up on our [**chargeback policies here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334), and hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you're ready to take care of that!
